WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed in latest source - you were right, Levva; the boxes were simply mis-labeled.
WorkItem.Description: The Moonkin model's stats graph gives tick box options for Strength, Agility, Attack Power & Expertise on the elitistjerks.com/rawr.php version 4.2.0.0 I used today 4/7/11. However the actual graph graphs Intellect, Spirit and Spell power so I suspect a labling problem rather than a stats problem. Expertise does still graph expertise, which isn't that good a stat for Moonkin :)

Comments.Message: I haven't played around with those options at all, since I didn't actually put them there, but I'll take a look.

The graph support module was developed by myself for the Enhance model. It was picked up, improved and added to many of the models by Jothay. It may however not have changed the text for the boxes so it might be that other models have the form and still have the Enhance Agi/Str/AP/expertise style of things.
